item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.6 (Build 640)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.6 (Build 640) Release Notes

  • New: You can add the player's position to be blacklisted (in case you mine the node then forget to blacklist it), click the Blacklisted button on the Routes tab
  • New: You can now gather anything! Check your combat profile!
  • New: When you die, PG will now calculate the shortest route back to your body vs. just running around aimlessly (lightly tested)
  • New: You can now specify the number of mobs near a node when searching for scary units!
  • New: Cleaned up UI (mostly combat profiles)
  • New: Added a save all routes button to the Routes tab
  • New: Numpad equals can now be used as a key binding (thanks j005u)
  • New: In follow/party mode, PG will now move toward a target by following (most of the time) if it's out of range
  • Bug Fix: Mob IDs can now be > 50000 for the alarm
  • Bug Fix: Clicking the config button to the right of the selected route on the Bot tab will now appropriately highlight the route in the Routes tab

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.5 (Build 625)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.5 (Build 625) Release Notes

  • New: You no longer need to enter your herbalism/skinning/mining skill level! PG will detect it automatically! (thanks JuJu!)
  • Bug Fix: Blacklisting nodes will now work correctly (you could add them, but it would fail in 1.5.1.4 when you started the bot
  • Bug Fix: Fishing pools in routes should now work correctly
  • Bug Fix:/startattack option in behaviors will now save correctly (thanks j005u)
  • Bug Fix: When trying to add a new route PG would just spin (stuck in an infinite loop)
  • Bug Fix: It didn't look like you were in combat if your pet aggroed the mob (and the use pet box wasn't checked)

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.4 (Build 619)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.4 (Build 619) Release Notes

  • New Pocket Gnome logo and toolbar images!
  • New: You can now ignore nodes if ONLY elites are nearby (check your combat profile)
  • New: Mining/Herbalism for Cataclysm nodes operates correctly
  • New: You can now decrease/increase ALL of your routes nodes by an offset (great for making a ground route a flying one ;) )
  • New: You can now BLACKLIST NODES! Right click them in the object view and it will be added to the currently selected route! Then you can edit the list of blacklisted nodes on the route tab.
  • New: Twin Peaks and Battle of Gilneas added! You should now be able to run routes in them.
  • New: Faction template updated, so you should no longer have issues w/Worgens! (untested)
  • New: Option to stop looting when bags are full added to the combat profile
  • New: Worgens added to the Players UI
  • New: You can now enter a macro in waypoint actions, vs. having to always have the macro on EVERY toon
  • Bug Fix: If PG says there is an update, there will actually be one now ;)
  • Bug Fix: Chat will no longer be closed if lower left action bar is bound to F13. BUT - if you are looting or targeting mobs, your chat will be closed.
  • Bug Fix: If you now create a new combat profile, it will be reflected on the main bot screen
  • Bug Fix: No longer need to restart PG if you train fishing, just start/stop
  • Bug Fix: If you start to fly off to your death for no reason, you will be auto corrected after going 300 yards away
  • Bug Fix: Excessive memory reads during fishing has been corrected
  • Bug Fix: Inventory checks should now operate correct (i.e. log out on full inventory)
  • Bug Fix: Mail action issues have been semi corrected
  • Bug Fix: Issue with looting and combat
  • Bug Fix: Searching for nearby mobs will now ignore critters and dead mobs
  • Bug Fix: Various memory leaks fixed by Gnome Overlord

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.3 (Build 573)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.3 (Build 573) Release Notes

  • Gathering nodes added for Catalclysm
  • BG Queueing may work now (untested)
  • Fixed checking for items in your bags
  • Mounts should be pulled correctly now for following (untested)
  • You can now gather gas clouds

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.2 (Build 568)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.2 (Build 568) Release Notes

  • Updated for 4.0.3

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.1 (Build 566)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.1.1 (Build 566) Release Notes

  • Fishing + Applying lure now works correctly
  • Untested: Added options for Holy Power, Eclipse, and Soul Shards for behaviors
  • Untested: Fixed combo points rule
  • Re-wrote how some conditions were calculated (/annoyed)
  • Untested: Rune checks should now function correctly, except death runes (are those still around?)
  • Security tab removed from Settings (it was pointless)
  • Updated base fields to use offset signatures (more likely for things to NOT break between patches)

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.1 (Build 551)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.1 (Build 551) Release Notes

  • Updated for 4.0.1!
  • Offset controller completely re-written, gnome should no longer crash withe goblin!

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.0.2 (Build 516)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.0.2 (Build 516) Release Notes

  • Strand of the Ancients - Updated for Horde to walk you off of the boat
  • PvP - Queue preparation weight update
  • PvP - Crash fixed w/respect to PvP route switching and following
  • Bug fix - Deleting an ignore entry no longer delete the combat profile, sorry!
  • Casting - Update on casting when items/spells are no longer usable/available
  • UI - Gathering/Looting/PvP Options moved to combat profiles
  • UI - PvP/Normal is now separated on the main screen
  • UI - Click and drag support added to the rule editor
  • Combat - /startattack option added in behaviors, you no longer have to create a macro
  • Spells - Error handling re-written
  • Movement - Large portion of the movement controller was re-written, should be smoother

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.0.3 (Build 518)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.0.3 (Build 518) Release Notes

  • Updated for 3.3.5
  • WARNING: This has NOT been tested with the new Warden (nor has it been confirmed on mac), use at your own risk

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.0.2 (Build 516)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.0.2 (Build 516) Release Notes

  • Strand of the Ancients - Updated for Horde to walk you off of the boat
  • PvP - Queue preparation weight update
  • PvP - Crash fixed w/respect to PvP route switching and following
  • Bug fix - Deleting an ignore entry no longer delete the combat profile, sorry!
  • Casting - Update on casting when items/spells are no longer usable/available
  • UI - Gathering/Looting/PvP Options moved to combat profiles
  • UI - PvP/Normal is now separated on the main screen
  • UI - Click and drag support added to the rule editor
  • Combat - /startattack option added in behaviors, you no longer have to create a macro
  • Spells - Error handling re-written
  • Movement - Large portion of the movement controller was re-written, should be smoother

item.title: Pocket Gnome 1.5.0.1 (Build 506)
item.description:
Pocket Gnome 1.5.0.1 (Build 506) Release Notes

  • Mail Actions should actually function now
  • Dropdowns within combat profiles actually populate players now
  • PvP route handling updates
  • Follow updates
